name: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GREVY), Respondents
name_abbreviation: City of Philadelphia v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GREVY), Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of April, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Application for Supersedeas are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
992 A.2d 858
CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GREVY), Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 14, 2010.
